Tip of the Day
The base chance to find most Chests is 1/250, which you can increase with better gear and tools.

Copper bar
Type: Material
Value: 1
Fine Value: 11
Keyword: Bar
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

The copper bar gleams with a reddish-orange luster, reflecting its metallic strength and versatility in various applications.

The Copper bar item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Copper bar is an ingredient in the following recipes:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Craft a copper hatchet Needs Basic Workshop service or better. Crafting lvl. 2 2x Copper bar
1x Birch plank		 1x Copper hatchet
Craft a copper pickaxe Needs Basic Workshop service or better. Crafting lvl. 2 2x Copper bar
1x Birch plank		 1x Copper pickaxe
Craft a copper sickle Needs Basic Workshop service or better. Crafting lvl. 2 1x Copper bar
1x Birch plank
1x Twine		 1x Copper sickle
Make a copper shield Needs Basic Forge service or better. Smithing lvl. 3 2x Copper bar 1x Copper shield
Make a copper sword Needs Basic Forge service or better. Smithing lvl. 6 2x Copper bar 1x Copper sword

Job Boards

Copper bar can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Reward
Kallaheim job board Kallaheim 29 +1  Jarvonia Faction Reputation
